verses.roman:
advaita karila prabhura caraṇa vandana
ācāryere kaila prabhu prema-āliṅgana

synonyms: advaita—Advaita Ācārya; karila—did; prabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; caraṇa—of the lotus feet; vandana—worship; ācāryere—unto Advaita Ācārya; kaila—did; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prema-āliṅgana—embracing in ecstatic love.
translation: First Advaita Ācārya offered prayers to the lotus feet of the Lord, and the Lord immediately embraced Him in ecstatic love.
